remarks.format: 这是一个围绕 OS 调用的简单包装器, 不会执行任何名称重整。This is a simple wrapper around OS calls and does not perform any name mangling.

summary.span: 提供用于加载本机库的高级 API。

span.span: Provides a high-level API for loading a native library.
The handle for the loaded library.

remarks.format: 如果给定了库名称, 则此方法将根据调用程序集的运行时配置、输入参数和特性搜索特定路径。Given a library name, this method searches specific paths based on the runtime configuration, input parameters, and attributes of the calling assembly. 如果该`searchPath`参数为非 null, 则使用此枚举中的标志。If the `searchPath` parameter is non-null, the flags in this enumeration are used. 否则, 将使用在调用程序集 (如果有) 上指定的标志。Otherwise, the flags specified by the on the calling assembly, if any are present, are used. 此方法不会调用以下托管回调进行本机库解析:This method does not invoke the following managed callbacks for native library resolution: - 每程序集注册的回调。The per-assembly registered callback. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event.

span.span: or is .
is not a .
The library can't be found.
The library is not valid.

span.span: The assembly for which the resolver is registered.

param.span: 要注册的解析程序回调。

span.span: The resolver callback to register.

summary.span: 设置回调，用于解析从程序集进行的本机库导入。

span.span: Sets a callback for resolving native library imports from an assembly.

remarks.format: 此每程序集冲突解决程序是第一次尝试解析此程序集启动的本机库加载。This per-assembly resolver is the first attempt to resolve native library loads initiated by this assembly. 每个程序集只能注册一个解析程序。Only one resolver can be registered per assembly. 尝试使用注册第二个冲突解决程序失败。Trying to register a second resolver fails with an .

span.span: or paramref name="resolver" /> is .

exception.span: 已为此程序集设置解析程序。

span.span: A resolver is already set for this assembly.
